channel.title: Luzoxpk 317 (pking server)
channel.description:
Luzox pvp aka luzox pk online since December 2012.
Join now for loads of fun gaming experience.
Welcome to the Advertisement of a brand new server named luzoxpk.
This server is a pk based server, but no worries we added all working skills cept farming coming soon, minigames and ofcourse bosses/monsters to slay. When you get bored of pking or don't want to pk at all you can do some skilling some bossing or what ever you want to do. We have 2 options or you train your account or you set your combat to 126, ofcourse training your account gives more abilities such as more pk challenge points more pk points and many more.
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]Features:[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FF00"]Luzoxpk has these features below:[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FFFF"]Flawless combat system[/COLOR] [COLOR="#008000"]Target system with target points[/COLOR] [COLOR="#EE82EE"]Automated Voting System[/COLOR] [COLOR="#00FFFF"]Donator zone and Extreme donator zone[/COLOR] [COLOR="#000080"]Great community[/COLOR] [COLOR="#A52A2A"]All rs07 bosses and almost all skills except for farming (under construction)[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF0000"]Working minigames[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FFA07A"]Grandpa Jack minigame were you can get the rarest items (depends on how far you come in waves)[/COLOR] [COLOR="#000080"]Fight pits with rewards such as pkp and cash[/COLOR] [COLOR="#2F4F4F"]Stable economy[/COLOR] [COLOR="#DAA520"]Constant updates[/COLOR] [COLOR="#A52A2A"]All monsters give Slayer exp[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF8C00"]Double pkp weekends[/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF8C00"]Completionist cape with achievments![/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF8C00"]Korasi/torva/pernix/virtus/tokhaar-kal![/COLOR] [COLOR="#FF8C00"]This time Trained account bonusses!![/COLOR]
The new content here:
New and improved Donator shop:
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/870d43b280281f3517be7605f4f2006b.png[/img]
Ofcourse we do holiday events!
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/1b2679db05d1ec5d57d9786ce95f3ecd.png[/img]
Perfected slayer! with tasks
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/58dcf14838c5ecbd60f81b6ca682d5f9.png[/img]
Got to much pkp "pking points" simply convert them :o
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/ef6faf23b8bdd2e418b264c7afeb59eb.png[/img]
And ofcourse the improbements on trained accounts
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/063c337fcb7a20459dd95d2028d2c352.png[/img]
Are you a set lvl account and would like to become a trained account no worries :)
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/90e566ed823c44a20bc302ed96f449df.png[/img]
Completionist cape requirments
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/8b31460c1b083cd71c3bac225898da7d.png[/img]
And last but not least of the content i got no media for else this post would become to big:
::monsters (added 1k npc's) ::train (training) and graardor chamber comander zilyana chamber and kree arra you need 50 kills to enter :)
Chose your starter [IMG]http://gyazo.com/a0fe4c987595cdc6ba66cb3f6cf7997f.png[/img]
and of course the bosses ::boss or quest tab
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/3c406e7b067df2951b34bde2180a1760.png[/img]
than we got pk zones and monsters ::pk or quest tab picture below
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/99a29d6c180b3cdf458d72925427bd46.png[/img]
Best minigame to make money is granpa jack picture below
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/9c038656e76041ec5cfd494c8bbc04ba.png[/img]
Trained account training places ::train
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/d7c31e95f2d700ed02920eead9747e60.png[/img]
The donator zone ::dz
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/50a0e180f890cb74d29fbc808ad8b119.png[/img]
Saradomin pledging
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/3de884a40c6ffc9cdcf41ce65fc651b1.png[/img]
Saradomin Unlockables
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/5457142187e7715bcf6545816233ec5d.png[/img]
Zamorak pledging
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/aa554f0946bbf1bacbf259f317512448.png[/img]
Zamorak Unlockables
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/b51fee8a99300c20888f849fa4b905a1.png[/img]
Red dragons with a special key drop 'shiny key' there is a chest at home u can get random items
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/99e3a1c6e0893ca5c8bf54bef8e1830a.png[/img]
Key rewards 6 keys used
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/33305d9c138dd7d027f8904b86149a4c.png[/img]
Free point shop to use for free items to pking with for begginers or boss, verry usefull!
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/f06b64dfd5422f83fb73576f3681a8d6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/chat.png[/img][url=http://www.luzoxpk.com]Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://impericapvp.com/icons/play.png[/img][url=http://www.luzoxpk.com/Webclient]Webclient[/url]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/29fe1fa20df07c206194a51b3693bafe.png[/img][url=http://luzoxpk.ipbhost.com/luzoxclient.jar]Download Client[/url]
[IMG]https://cdn0.iconfinder.com/data/icons/30_Free_Black_ToolBar_Icons/40/Black_ThumbsUp.png[/img][url=http://pkcity.net/luzoxvote/#?step=1]Vote[/url]
Hope to see you guys in game we are trying to reach about 35 players we got daily 10-15 players and in weekends 15-23 our max online ever is 32
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/25e587c4b3ef94d58f2743d01bcff646.png[/img]
Help us grow and invite friends thats alll
Kind Regards,
ipkmills founder of luzoxpk & luzox-pvp

item.title: Luzoxpk 317 (pking server)
item.dc:creator: @luzoxpk luzoxpk
item.description:
@luzoxpk wrote:

Luzox pvp aka luzox pk online since December 2012.

Join now for loads of fun gaming experience.

Welcome to the Advertisement of a brand new server named luzoxpk.

This server is a pk based server, but no worries we added all working skills cept farming coming soon, minigames and ofcourse bosses/monsters to slay.
When you get bored of pking or don’t want to pk at all you can do some skilling some bossing or what ever you want to do.
We have 2 options or you train your account or you set your combat to 126, ofcourse training your account gives more abilities such as more pk challenge points more pk points and many more.

[COLOR="#00FFFF"]Features:[/COLOR]

[COLOR="#00FF00"]Luzoxpk has these features below:[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]Flawless combat system[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#008000"]Target system with target points[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#EE82EE"]Automated Voting System[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#00FFFF"]Donator zone and Extreme donator zone[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#000080"]Great community[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#A52A2A"]All rs07 bosses and almost all skills except for farming (under construction)[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF0000"]Working minigames[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FFA07A"]Grandpa Jack minigame were you can get the rarest items (depends on how far you come in waves)[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#000080"]Fight pits with rewards such as pkp and cash[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#2F4F4F"]Stable economy[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#DAA520"]Constant updates[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#A52A2A"]All monsters give Slayer exp[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"]Double pkp weekends[/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"]Completionist cape with achievments![/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"]Korasi/torva/pernix/virtus/tokhaar-kal![/COLOR]
[COLOR="#FF8C00"]This time Trained account bonusses!![/COLOR]

The new content here:

New and improved Donator shop:

Ofcourse we do holiday events!

Perfected slayer! with tasks

Got to much pkp “pking points” simply convert them :o

And ofcourse the improbements on trained accounts

Are you a set lvl account and would like to become a trained account no worries

Completionist cape requirments

And last but not least of the content i got no media for else this post would become to big:

::monsters (added 1k npc’s)
::train (training)
and graardor chamber
comander zilyana chamber
and kree arra
you need 50 kills to enter

Chose your starter

and of course the bosses ::boss or quest tab

than we got pk zones and monsters ::pk or quest tab picture below

Best minigame to make money is granpa jack picture below

Trained account training places ::train

The donator zone ::dz

Saradomin pledging

Saradomin Unlockables

Zamorak pledging

Zamorak Unlockables

Red dragons with a special key drop ‘shiny key’ there is a chest at home u can get random items

Key rewards 6 keys used

Free point shop to use for free items to pking with for begginers or boss, verry usefull!

Forums

Download Client

Vote

Hope to see you guys in game we are trying to reach about 35 players we got daily 10-15 players and in weekends 15-23 our max online ever is 32

Help us grow and invite friends thats alll

Kind Regards,

ipkmills founder of luzoxpk & luzox-pvp
